page.title: 03Colwall Shopping Facilities
page.content: Colwall - or Colwall Stone - possesses an excellent range of shops for a village. Our survey revealed two grocery shops, one of which had just changed hands because the previous owner had found the competition from Malvern and Ledbury supermarkets too much. There are two butchers' shops, selling largely locally produced meat. A very good chemist, two hairdressing salons, two banks (mornings only), a hardware store, and an estate agent all offer their services. The newsagent's shop is owned by a Magistrate. In addition there is a garage, a Post Office, and a public library. The village boasts a residential hotel - The Park Hotel - and two inns, The Crown and The Horse and Jockey. Finally the village is still the proud possessor of a railway station.
